subTitle: Ask us any questions about our brand and products and get factual answers.

faqs.question: What models of plastic recycling machines do you offer?
faqs.answer: Our range includes a variety of plastic recycling machines such as PET bottle recycling lines, PE/PP film recycling machines, and plastic granulation machines. Each model is designed to meet different recycling needs, ensuring efficiency and reliability.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade my current recycling machine to a newer model?
faqs.answer: Yes, upgrades are possible and recommended to keep your operations modern and efficient. We provide upgrade kits and professional support to help you transition from your current setup to the latest technology available in our product range.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of bulk purchasing recycling machines from your company?
faqs.answer: Customers who order in bulk enjoy substantial discounts, extended warranties, and personalized after-sales services. Details vary depending on order size and machine models, so please contact our sales team for a customized proposal.

faqs.question: What type of customer support do you provide for your recycling machines?
faqs.answer: All our customers receive comprehensive support, including installation guidance, operational training, and troubleshooting. Higher-tier packages, such as our Premium support plan, offer 24/7 technical assistance and regular maintenance visits.

faqs.question: How often are the manuals for your machines and user instructions updated?
faqs.answer: We regularly update our machine manuals and user instructions to incorporate the latest safety guidelines, technological improvements, and troubleshooting tips. All updates are made available online and free of charge for our current customers.

faqs.question: Does your company provide turnkey solutions for industrial recycling projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in providing comprehensive turnkey solutions for industrial-scale recycling projects. This includes project assessment, system design, machine installation, and operational training, tailored to your specific requirements.
